title: Major Bank Stocks Post Third Week of Gains on Rate Trends
description: Shares of big US banks notched a third straight weekly gain, the longest winning streak since August, after updates at an industry conference fueled optimism that they’ll continue benefiting from a resilient economy and the widening gap between short- and long-term interest rates.
content: Shares of big US banks notched a third straight weekly gain, the longest winning streak since August, after updates at an industry conference fueled optimism that they’ll continue benefiting from a resilient economy and the widening gap between short- and long-term interest rates.
